Hi Hagop,

 

Hope you’re well.

 

We again had an accident at MFC al Qouz and the same barriers are damaged again.

 

Attached Police Report and work quotation FYR, kindly confirm to proceed to start repair work.

 

Regards,.

TARUN GULATI​​​​
